title: Fine-Tuning GPT-OSS 20B for Multilingual Reasoning
description: Adapted OpenAI's GPT-OSS 20B with LoRA and 4-bit quantization via Unsloth, enabling multilingual reasoning on a single NVIDIA A40 while trimming GPU memory overhead by ~70%.

title: Criminal Procedure Assistant — AI Legal Chatbot
description: Production-grade RAG chatbot answering Massachusetts criminal procedure questions with IRAC-structured responses, hybrid retrieval, reranking, and guardrails for legal reliability.

title: Feature Store Credit Scoring Platform
description: Built a real-time loan approval prediction system backed by Feast feature store for consistent, low-latency feature delivery across training and production pipelines.

title: Meeting Minutes Automation Toolkit
description: Multi-agent GenAI workflow that ingests meeting audio, transcribes, summarizes, extracts action items, and drafts follow-up emails using orchestrated YAML pipelines.

title: AI Nutrition Assistant
description: Agentic RAG nutrition coach with persistent user memory, hybrid retrieval, and Streamlit UI for natural, goal-driven coaching.

title: Kubeflow + KServe MLOps Pipeline
description: End-to-end MLOps workflow on AWS EC2 using Kubeflow Pipelines and KServe to train, package, and serve scikit-learn models via Istio ingress.

title: Modern ELT Pipeline
description: dbt + Snowflake + Airflow pipeline transforming TPCH analytics data with orchestrated, modular ELT workflows.

title: Spotify Skip Predictor
description: Predictive analytics tool forecasting track skips with SMOTE-balanced training, optimized XGBoost/Random Forest models, FastAPI inference, and Streamlit UX.

title: 2048 Game on AWS EKS
description: Deployed the 2048 web app on Amazon EKS with Fargate-backed pods, ALB ingress, and IAM roles via IRSA for secure, serverless scaling.

title: NYC Taxi Duration MLOps Pipeline
description: End-to-end ML system predicting NYC taxi trip durations with DVC-managed data pipeline, MLflow experiment tracking, and Dockerized FastAPI inference service.

title: IPL Teams Performance Dashboard
description: Interactive Tableau dashboard visualizing IPL team performance across seasons with drill-down filters, trend charts, and printable summaries.

title: GANs on CIFAR-10
description: TensorFlow GAN assignment covering minimax objectives, mode collapse, and an implemented generator/discriminator pipeline that trains on CIFAR-10 to synthesize realistic images.

title: Variational Autoencoders on CIFAR-10 & Beyond
description: Compared fully connected vs convolutional VAEs on CIFAR-10, then extended to Fashion-MNIST and CelebA with latent interpolations showcasing smooth, realistic generations.

title: IMDb Movie Analytics & Visualization
description: Exploratory data analysis of the top 100 IMDb movies from the past decade with demographic rating breakdowns, revenue stats, and visual storytelling in Jupyter.

title: NGO Aid Allocation Strategy
description: Clustered 167 countries by socio-economic indicators using K-Means and hierarchical methods to prioritize aid toward least-developed nations like Sierra Leone and Haiti.

title: Retail Market Basket Analytics
description: Cleansed multi-table retail dataset, engineered features, and visualized purchasing patterns in Tableau to surface actionable cross-sell insights for market basket analysis.

title: Lead Conversion Scoring for X Education
description: Logistic regression pipeline that cleaned and engineered lead data, calibrated probability thresholds, and delivered 81% accuracy to target 80% conversion identification.
